attributes.action: Allow people with GPs in wales to directly refer themselves for therapy.
attributes.background: If you have a GP stationed in england you can refer yourself directly to a psychological therapies service without seeing your GP. Unfortunetly in wales this service is not available and people suffering with mental illness have to talk to their GPs, who are usually not proffessionals in this area

rejection.details:
The health care system in Wales is the responsibility of the Welsh Government and Welsh Assembly.

You can petition the Welsh Assembly here:

https://www.assembly.wales/en/gethome/e-petitions/Pages/e-petitions.aspx
